definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be precious, prized, appraised (NH id., Pi., Hiph.; Aram. [[יְקַר]], yiqar, be heavy, precious; Pa. honour; [[יַקִּיר]], yaqiur weighty, precious, honoured; cf. As. aḳâru, be precious, costly, and deriv., Dl:HWB 240; Ar. waqara be heavy, II. honour; waqa0run dignity; Sab. n. [[יקר]] honour DHM:ZMG 1883, 402)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = highly valued, esteemed, David's name, [[וַיִּיקַר]] [[שְׁמוֹ מְאׂד]] 1Sa 18:30; of Israel, [[יׇקַרְתָּ בְעֵינַי]] Is 43:4 (+ [[נִכְבַּדְתָּ]], [[אֲהַבְתִּיְ]]); of God's thoughts [[וְלִי מַה־יׇּֽקִרוּ]] [[רֵעֶיְ]] Ps 139:17 (Ew Hi Hup render hard, difficult: cf. [[יַקִּירָה]] Da 2:11).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: esp. of life ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]), in phr. [[יׇֽקִרָה נַפְשִׁי בְּעֵינֶיְ]] 1Sa 26:21, i.e. thou hast spared it; so (juss.) 2Ki 1:13, 2Ki 1:14; similarly [[יֵיקַר דָּמָם בְּעֵינׇיו]] Ps 72:14 (‖[[מִתּוֹח וּמֵחָמָס יִגְאַל נַפְשָׁס]]).
be appraised, valued, [[אֶדֶר הַיְקָר אֲשֶׁר יׇקַרְתִּי מֵעֲלֵיהֶם]] Zec 11:13 the magnificence of the price at which I was appraised (and dismissed) from them!

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[אוֹקִיר אֱנוֹשׁ מִפָָּז]] Is 13:12 I will make men more rare (lit. precious) than fine gold. Imv. [[הׂקַר]] Pr 25:17 make rare (i.e. withhold) thy foot from the house of thy friend.
